articles.title: Blue Jays quickly running out of time as Berrios struggles again - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: For the third straight outing, Jose Berrios dug his team a hole that they couldn't climb out of. But his struggles are just one reason the Toronto Blue Jays are quickly running out of time in the American League playoff race.

articles.title: Whanganui's Geordie Beamish stuns American's early celebrations to win mile in Oregon - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Craig Engels was waving to the crowd with victory in sight - he did not see the flying Kiwi coming up behind him
articles.content:
New Zealand middle distance runner Geordie Beamish made a mockery of American Craig Engels early celebrations to claim the international mile race at the Prefontaine Classic meeting in Oregon.

articles.title: US grants Pfizer COVID vaccine full approval, triggering new mandates - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Around 52% of the American population is fully vaccinated, but health authorities have hit a wall of vaccine-hesitant people, impeding the national campaign.
